short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension displays the context of an element in the chrome devtools "Elements" panel

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension can be used to see the context of each element in the element panel of the current page in the developer tools
